com.amplifyframework.devmenu

Class DeveloperMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.devmenu.DeveloperMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShakeDetector.Listener

    public final class DeveloperMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShakeDetector.Listener
    Manage the display and shake detection behavior for the developer menu.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DeveloperMenu.HideAction
      Interface to handle the action to take when the developer menu should be hidden.
